GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 02-36.14N 002-45.10E
   AT 171100Z JUL. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
   CAUTION. REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   PHONE: 332 5631 2424, FAX: 332 5631 2584
   AND TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   coord.navarea2@shom.fr.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 241522Z JUL 20.
